languages.text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.
languages.original_text: Всякий раз, когда владелец успешно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от входящей атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, он получает +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder successfully dodges or parries an incoming attack, they gain +10 momentum.
Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.
Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} value is increased by +10.

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает блок, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} увеличивается на 10.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает блок, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} увеличивается на 10.

Когда персонаж совершает блок, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} увеличивается на 10.

languages.text: Cuando el portador bloquea, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque, el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} aumenta en +10.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador bloquea, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque, el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} aumenta en +10.

languages.text: 每当装备者格挡、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}都会提高10点。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者格挡、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}都会提高10点。

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque, la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} augmente de +10.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur bloque, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque, la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} augmente de +10.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger blockt, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} um +10.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger blockt, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, erhöht sich die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} um +10.

languages.text: 使用者が攻撃をブロック、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}するたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+10される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が攻撃をブロック、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}するたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+10される。

languages.text: Takan kişi, gelen saldırıya karşı başarılı bir bloklama, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yaptığında +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, gelen saldırıya karşı başarılı bir bloklama, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yaptığında +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
